name: pose2sim
description: Markerless kinematics with any cameras — From 2D Pose estimation to 3D OpenSim motion
readme_summary: Pose2Sim is a Python-based workflow for markerless 3D human and animal kinematics, transforming 2D pose estimations from various sources into detailed 3D motion data compatible with OpenSim. It offers a cost-effective, accurate, and robust alternative to traditional marker-based motion capture, suitable for sports, clinical, and animation applications.
key_features: Uses recent pose estimation models (RTMPose, DeepLabCut)
Calibration tool based on scene measurements
primary_use_case: To enable markerless 3D motion capture and kinematic analysis from readily available camera footage, providing an accessible and accurate alternative to traditional motion capture systems.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled sculptor in a modern studio, using a magical chisel and hammer to transform a flat, 2D sketch of a human figure into a detailed, dynamic 3D statue that is actively posing. The sketch is projected onto a screen behind the sculptor, showing input keypoints, while the emerging statue glows with life. Subtle digital particles representing motion data flow from the sketch to the statue. The studio is filled with various cameras (GoPros, webcams) subtly placed around the scene, hinting at the input sources. The repository name 'Pose2Sim' is subtly etched onto the sculptor's workbench. The overall mood is one of creation and transformation, with clean lines and a bright, inspiring atmosphere. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with a focus on clarity and a vibrant color palette.

name: ease-master
description: Design motion that feels real. The ultimate easing visualization and generation tool for modern frontend development.
readme_summary: EaseMaster is a web-based tool for visualizing and generating animation easing curves. It allows users to design custom Cubic Bezier curves or tune spring physics parameters, then export production-ready code for CSS, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and GSAP.
key_features: Multi-Framework Export (CSS, Tailwind, Framer Motion, GSAP)
primary_use_case: To provide frontend developers with an intuitive visual tool to create, preview, and export custom animation easing curves for various frameworks and CSS.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan, representing a frontend developer, stands at a workbench. In front of them is a glowing, interactive loom. They are weaving threads of light, one set representing smooth, predictable curves (Cubic Bezier) and another set representing organic, bouncy springs (Spring Physics). The threads are being fed into different output spools labeled 'CSS', 'Tailwind', 'Framer Motion', and 'GSAP'. The background is a clean, modern studio with subtle digital particles and a small screen showing the EaseMaster logo. The overall mood is creative and precise, with a focus on transforming abstract motion concepts into tangible code. 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant, glowing elements and clear iconography.

name: winshot
description: WinShot - A Windows screenshot tool with annotation, crop, and export features built with Wails (Go + React/TypeScript)
readme_summary: WinShot is a modern, lightweight screenshot tool for Windows that offers advanced capture modes, rich annotation tools, non-destructive editing, and flexible export options. It aims to provide a superior user experience with a glassmorphism UI and significantly smaller file size compared to Electron-based applications.
key_features: Multiple capture modes (Fullscreen, Region, Window, Hotkey)
Rich annotation tools (Shapes, Arrows, Text, Numbers, Spotlight)
Multiple export formats (PNG, JPEG) and ratios
System tray integration and global hotkeys
primary_use_case: Capturing, annotating, and exporting screenshots efficiently on Windows with a user-friendly interface and advanced editing capabilities.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist's workbench, bathed in soft, ambient light. In the center, a magical magnifying glass hovers over a captured scene (represented by a shimmering, ethereal window). As the magnifying glass focuses, vibrant digital ink flows from its edges, allowing the artist's hand (partially visible) to draw precise arrows, add clear text labels, and highlight key areas on the captured scene. Small, glowing icons representing different capture modes (like a camera, a rectangle, a window) float around the workbench. The overall aesthetic is clean, modern, and slightly futuristic, with subtle glassmorphism elements on the UI tools. The repository name 'WinShot' is subtly etched onto the workbench. Style: 3D isometric illustration, high detail, vibrant but soft color palette.

name: MineContext
description: MineContext is your proactive context-aware AI partner（Context-Engineering+ChatGPT Pulse）
readme_summary: MineContext is a proactive, context-aware AI partner that integrates with your digital world to provide insights, summaries, and task management. It leverages screenshots and multimodal information to understand your context and deliver relevant information proactively.
key_features: Delivers insights, summaries, to-do lists, activity records
Local-first and local AI model options for privacy
primary_use_case: To act as an intelligent assistant that understands a user's digital context and proactively provides relevant information and task management.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, ethereal owl perched on a glowing digital tree, its eyes scanning a swirling vortex of information (screenshots, documents, code snippets). The owl is actively plucking out key insights and neatly organizing them into glowing orbs of knowledge that float down to a user's desk below. Subtle UI elements representing summaries and to-do lists are visible on the desk. The background is a softly lit, organized digital workspace. The overall mood is intelligent and helpful. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with a clean, modern aesthetic, emphasizing clarity and proactive assistance.

name: dexter
description: An autonomous agent for deep financial research
readme_summary: Dexter is an autonomous financial research agent built with TypeScript that leverages task planning, self-reflection, and real-time market data to answer complex financial questions. It breaks down queries into executable steps, gathers data, validates its findings, and synthesizes them into comprehensive, data-backed answers.
primary_use_case: Performing deep financial research and analysis autonomously by answering complex financial questions.
cover_image_prompt: A wise, robotic owl perched on a stack of financial reports, holding a magnifying glass that illuminates glowing data streams. The owl is meticulously piecing together complex financial charts and graphs from scattered data points. In the background, subtle holographic displays show income statements and balance sheets. The scene is set in a modern, dimly lit study, with a soft glow emanating from the data streams. Small, almost imperceptible code snippets float around the owl's head. The repository name 'Dexter' is subtly etched on the owl's perch. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style, with a sophisticated color palette of deep blues, golds, and whites, emphasizing clarity and intelligence.

name: superpowers
description: Claude Code superpowers: core skills library
readme_summary: Superpowers provides a comprehensive software development workflow for coding agents, built upon a modular system of 'skills'. It guides agents through a structured process from initial idea refinement to final code implementation and review, emphasizing best practices like TDD and YAGNI.
key_features: Emphasis on TDD, YAGNI, and DRY principles
Automated code review and task execution
Support for multiple coding agent platforms (Claude Code, Codex, OpenCode)
primary_use_case: To automate and structure the software development workflow for AI coding agents, enabling them to produce high-quality code more autonomously and efficiently.
cover_image_prompt: A master architect meticulously designing a complex, futuristic city blueprint on a holographic table. The blueprint itself is composed of glowing, interconnected code snippets and data streams. As the architect points, smaller, diligent robotic builders (representing subagents) emerge from the table, each carrying specific building components (code blocks) and assembling them precisely according to the plan. The scene is set in a clean, modern workshop with subtle digital interfaces displaying progress metrics and code reviews. The overall mood is one of organized creation and intelligent automation, with the repository name 'Superpowers' subtly integrated into the holographic display. Style: 3D isometric illustration with vibrant, glowing elements and clear, defined structures.
